sentences.sContent: Our taxi pulled up at Old Delhi station and a porter sprinted to the door.
sentences.sCn: 我们的出租车停在老德里车站，一个搬运工疾步跑向车门。

synos.tran: 门房；服务员；[交]行李搬运工；守门人

remMethod.val: port(拿， 运) ＋ er(表人) → 搬运工人

words.tran: 港口，口岸；（计算机的）端口；左舷；舱门
转到陆上运输；经陆上运输绕过

trans.tranOther: someone whose job is to carry people’s bags at railway stations, airports etc
